statements: SELECT * FROM resource_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, course_id FROM resource_materials WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM resource_materials WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_materials WHERE course_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT material_name, published_date FROM resource_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY published_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM resource_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, published_date FROM resource_materials WHERE material_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT material_name, course_id FROM resource_materials WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM resource_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY material_id ASC, material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_materials WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND published_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM resource_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM resource_materials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT * FROM resource_materials WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT material_name, material_type, course_id FROM resource_materials ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM resource_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%science%';
SELECT * FROM resource_materials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM resource_materials WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT r.material_name, cr.resource_name FROM resource_materials r INNER JOIN curriculum_resources cr ON r.material_id = cr.material_id WHERE r.material_type = 'Video';

SELECT r.material_name, cr.resource_name FROM resource_materials r INNER JOIN curriculum_resources cr ON r.material_id = cr.material_id WHERE cr.course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY r.material_name ASC;
SELECT material_id, COUNT(*) AS resource_count FROM curriculum_resources GROUP BY material_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, start_date, location FROM Courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM CurriculumResources WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, course_name FROM CourseMaterials JOIN Courses ON CourseMaterials.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM CourseMaterials ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date FROM Courses WHERE location = 'Online';
SELECT cm.material_name, cr.resource_name FROM CourseMaterials cm INNER JOIN CurriculumResources cr ON cm.course_id = cr.course_id;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_description FROM materials WHERE material_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_description FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Document' AND material_id < 100 ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT materials.material_id, materials.material_name, resources.resource_name FROM materials INNER JOIN resources ON materials.material_id = resources.material_id;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ResourceMaterials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM ResourceMaterials WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 2 AND material_id = 3;
SELECT instructor_name FROM Instructors WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM ResourceMaterials WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 100;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses INNER JOIN Instructors ON Courses.course_id = Instructors.course_id;
SELECT resource_name, material_name, material_type FROM CurriculumResources INNER JOIN ResourceMaterials ON CurriculumResources.material_id = ResourceMaterials.material_id;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(course_material_id) AS material_count FROM Courses INNER JOIN CourseMaterials ON Courses.course_id = CourseMaterials.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
